name: Fighter
shortDescription: Masters of martial combat, skilled with a wide variety of weapons and armor.
description: Fighters share an unparalleled mastery with weapons and armor, relying on rigorous training, physical excellence, and tactical skill to overcome their foes.

features.name: Fighting Style
features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

features.name: Second Wind
features.description: You can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

features.name: Action Surge
features.description: On your turn, you can take one additional action. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

subclass.label: Martial Archetype
subclass.description: Choose a martial archetype that reflects your combat style and training.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement

features.name: Extra Attack
features.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.
